awd_titl_txt: Research Experiences for Undergraduates in Chemistry at     the University of Utah
awd_abstract_narration: This Research Experiences for Undergraduates (REU) Site project                 is for research activities in all the subfields (organic,                       physical, analytical, inorganic, and biochemistry) of                           chemistry.  During the summer of 1992, twelve undergraduate                     students will spend ten weeks engaged in research under the                     supervision of their faculty, graduate student, or postdoctoral                 fellow advisors.  A unique feature in this REU activity is use                  of a graduate student or postdocoral fellow as a "peer" mentor                  to help the student get started in the laboratory.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SITE-Res Exp for Ugrd Site
